name: Sandridge Energy, Inc.
description: Sandridge Energy, Inc. is an independent oil and natural gas exploration and production company based in the United States. Founded in 2006, Sandridge focuses primarily on the acquisition, exploration, and production of oil and natural gas reserves in key regions across the country, notably in the Mid-Continent and Permian Basin areas. The company has a reputation for operational excellence and strategic asset management, driving growth through a combination of organic development and opportunistic acquisitions. Sandridge is committed to maximizing shareholder value and maintaining fiscal discipline while pursuing innovative technologies to enhance recovery rates and operational efficiency. With a strong emphasis on environmental stewardship and sustainable practices, Sandridge aims to balance energy needs with responsible resource management. The company actively explores new production techniques and technologies to optimize its operations and reduce its environmental footprint. Sandridge Energy is also dedicated to engaging with the communities in which it operates, seeking to foster positive relationships and contribute to local economies. The company's mission is to be a leader in the energy sector while delivering reliable energy solutions to meet the demands of a changing market.

faq.answer: Paul McKinney is the CEO of Sandridge Energy, Inc.

faq.answer: Sandridge's primary products include crude oil, natural gas, and natural gas liquids.
